FuncDef:
The ospf suppress-flapping interface disable command disables OSPF interface flapping suppression.
The undo ospf suppress-flapping interface disable command enables OSPF interface flapping suppression. The ospf suppress-flapping interface disable command disables OSPF interface flapping suppression. The undo ospf suppress-flapping interface disable command enables OSPF interface flapping suppression. By default, OSPF interface flapping suppression is enabled.
